title: Smart Data Models - GTFS Schema
description: Common definitions of GTFS data models

zoneCode.description: Property. Transport zone to which this stop belongs to. Same as GTFS `zone_id`. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'

wheelChairAccessible.description: Property. Same as GTFS `wheelchair_boarding`. Enum:'0, 1 ,2'. Reference in [GTFS](https://developers.google.com/transit/gtfs/reference/#stopstxt)

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

hasService.description: Relationship. Service to which this rule applies to. Derived from `service_id`. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'
